WorkItem.Description: After a fresh install of Rawr, I noticed that most of the Idol's displayed in the ranged section for druids were missing. I checked the Edit Items section and it has 90% of the idols listed in the Item Database, but only around 5 display in the actual ranged item selection for druids.

Comments.Message: That's correct. Only a few idols are relevant/modeled for each model. What idols are you missing that you feel are relevant, and to what model?

http://www.wowhead.com/?item=38365 Idol of Perspicacious Attacks would be one. It's great for threat generation, I'm just surprised that most of them are filtered out while there are caster items that are not filtered out in the other gear slots. Once I get off work I could take a look at the rest of the idols and see what else stands out as relevant for the bear model but is currently filtered.

http://www.wowhead.com/?item=42588 - Deadly Gladiator's Idol of Resolve
http://www.wowhead.com/?item=42587 - Hateful Gladiator's Idol of Resolve
http://www.wowhead.com/?item=42574 - Savage Gladiator's Idol of Resolve
http://www.wowhead.com/?item=35019 - Brutal Gladiator's Idol of Resolve
http://www.wowhead.com/?item=38365 - Idol of Perspicacious Attacks
http://www.wowhead.com/?item=33947 - Vengeful Gladiator's Idol of Resolve
http://www.wowhead.com/?item=38295 - Idol of the Wastes
http://www.wowhead.com/?item=32257 - Idol of the White Stag
http://www.wowhead.com/?item=37573 - Idol of the Plainstalker
http://www.wowhead.com/?item=33946 - Merciless Gladiator's Idol of Resolve
http://www.wowhead.com/?item=33509 - Idol of Terror
http://www.wowhead.com/?item=33945 - Gladiator's Idol of Resolve
http://www.wowhead.com/?item=27744 - Idol of Ursoc
http://www.wowhead.com/?item=32387 - Idol of the Raven Goddess
http://www.wowhead.com/?item=28064 - Idol of the Wild
http://www.wowhead.com/?item=23198 - Idol of Brutality

Sorry if any of these items are now deprecated/unavailable, I just went down the list of all Idols on wowhead and selected those that would be beneficial for threat/defenses in Bear form.

The specific idol I'm interested in is the Idol of Perspicacious Attacks (http://www.wowhead.com/?item=38365), which can't apparently be modeled because the idol grants a constant amount of bonus damage to a bear's Maul and Swipe, neither of which are configurable attributes of items (at least as far as I can see). Given this should (I'm guessing) have a positive effect on a bear's numbers, it'd be worth being able to add to the model.
Aye, I'll try to model it, but for a short answer, you should only use that for AoE situations.

Many thanks, Astrylian. It'd be great if it does make it into the model, but I very much agree with (and highly appreciate) your policy of getting the 3.1 updated version out ASAP, even if some models are incomplete. Rawr is an amazing tool, and can only get better. :-)
Just got this with 2.2.5 as well - no problems with 2.2.2. Now this error when loading from the armory aborts the load...
At least the Idol of the Plainstalker should be added, since it's an easy to obtain quested version of Idol of Terror.
